title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Wikipedia
snippet: Currently (2024-2025) Slovenia is the Chair of Board of Governors, while Iceland and Turkey are the Vice Chairs. The Board of Directors consists of 23 members elected by the Board of Governors. These members can not be on the Board of Governors. Its function is to direct the general operations ...

title: EBRD announces new Head of Moldova
snippet: The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) has appointed Giuseppe Grimaldi to head its operations in Moldova from 1 October 2025, replacing Catarina Bjorlin Hansen.

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: We draw on three decades of regional knowledge and financial expertise to tailor our products and approaches to each client's needs. ... Odile Renaud-Basso is the current President of the Bank.
